name: 梁曉帆
objective: 介紹人因工程的理論基礎與實際應用之方法與模型，透過課堂報告與討論以及專題實作，使學生熟悉並俱備解決相關問題之能力。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction (Ch. 1)
Week 2: Research and design methods (Ch. 2-3)
Week 3-6: Human information processing (Ch. 4-7)
Week 7: No class
Week 8: Mid-term Exam
Week 9-10: Dispaly/Control (Ch. 8-9)
Week 11-15: Work design (Ch. 10-14)
Week 16-17: Seminars: Applications of Human Factors (Ch. 15-17)
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam: 25%
Final Exam: 25%
Projects: 2x20% = 40%
Reports of Seminars: 2x5% = 10%
materials: An Introduction to Human Factors Engineering (2nd. Eds., 2004) by Wickens et al., Prentice Hall (滄海)
